title: GRASSELLO — Display
content:
Hello,  
wondering what this font is called?  
Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011155038im_/http:/typophile.com/files/10221_BEUYS_Grassello_fr_1000_5049.jpg)
author: Emma-L

comments.content: It's not an exact match, but it looks very close to an expanded **[Aurora Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011155038/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Aurora%20Cn%20BT%20-%20Regular&fid=1faaaa7e19f8201906db782b0d84752e&fsize=60&text=GRASSELLO%20DIFESA%20DELLA%20NATURA&fit=1)** by Bitstream
